definition: treasure-house/treasury/treasure-trove (often fig., book of treasured wisdom)

sentences.english: High king of heaven, my treasure thou art.
sentences.chinese: 诸天之君尊，你是我宝库。

sentences.english: After the feast, the bones were stored for months in treasure houses.
sentences.chinese: 盛宴结束以后，这些骨头就会被存放在宝库数月。

sentences.english: The Harvard-Yenching Library founded by him has become a treasure house for Chinese studies.
sentences.chinese: 他创建的哈佛燕京图书馆，成为西方汉学研究的宝库。

sentences.english: I would speed the vast career of civilizing lore .
sentences.chinese: 我要尽快地充实浩瀚的知识宝库。

sentences.english: You might be looking at a goldmine .
But the vast, virgin forest, extending nearly 2,100 kilometers along the eastern seaboard would prove to be a treasure-house.
sentences.chinese: 但是绵延在东部海岸的广阔原始森林将是巨大的宝库。

sentences.english: Based on the idea of Ren(being humane), people attach importance to man-oriented management.
sentences.chinese: 民本管理是中国传统管理宝库的瑰宝。

sentences.english: Our lost property departments really are treasure troves.
sentences.chinese: 我们的失物招领处简直就是一个宝库。

sentences.english: Foot massage goes back to ancient times. It's a gem of the treasure-house of the traditional Chinese medical science.
sentences.chinese: 足部按摩源远流长，为中国传统中医学宝库中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.
sentences.chinese: 一部好的百科全书是知识宝库。

sentences.english: Go to resist a castle treasure-house, rend away now a time world the premier colourful head of general assembly.
sentences.chinese: 前往御殿宝库，抢走今次天下第一武道大会的彩头。

sentences.english: Light finds her treasure of colours throgh the antagonism of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 光从云阵的对抗里找到了她彩色的宝库。

sentences.english: Knowledge is a treasure , but practise is the key to it. -----Anonymous.
sentences.chinese: 知识是一个宝库，而实践却是打开这个宝库的钥匙。

sentences.english: Knowledge is a treasure , but practise is the key to it. -----Anonymous.
sentences.chinese: 知识是一个宝库，而实践却是打开这个宝库的钥匙。

sentences.english: Xiang Chu Culture"is the spiritual treasury of Hunan."
sentences.chinese: 湘楚文化是湖南人民精神财富的宝库。

sentences.english: God is infinite in holiness and all other perfections.
sentences.chinese: 它是神圣教导的完美宝库。

definition: precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
a rare treasure/sth priceless and unique
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
